data.eml:eml: A new species of Proceratophrys (Anura: Cycloramphidae) from western Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ávila, Robson W., Kawashita-Ribeiro, Ricardo A., Morais, Drausio H. (2011): A new species of Proceratophrys (Anura: Cycloramphidae) from western Brazil. Zootaxa 2890: 20-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202411
